definition: to join/to fit/to mate/to mix/to match/to deserve/to make up (a prescription)/to allocate
forehead/horizontal tablet or inscribed board/specified number or amount

sentences.english: Specify download quota for automatic retrievals.
sentences.chinese: 指定下載配額爲自動檢索。

sentences.english: The overall level of skilled migration will increase by 5750 program places.
sentences.chinese: 技術和商業移民的總體配額會增加5750個。

sentences.english: Subject to certain conditions, quotas can be traded among boats.
sentences.chinese: 按照一些條款，配額可以在漁船之間交易。

sentences.english: China will soon enter the quota-free times.
sentences.chinese: 中國即將進入“無配額時代”。

sentences.english: It provides duty-free and quota-free treatment for certain clothing and other products.
sentences.chinese: 它提供了特定服裝和其它產品免稅免配額待遇。

sentences.english: Sweden developed a system based on government-mandated quotas for green energy and a market for certificates.
sentences.chinese: 瑞典開發了一套基於授權綠色能源證書市場配額制度。

sentences.english: Copies of a quota authorization and Import Permit issued by Minister of Commerce.
sentences.chinese: 經貿部簽發的進口配額授權和許可證的複印件。

sentences.english: To be effective, quota should be set below the equilibrium quantity.
sentences.chinese: 配額應定低於均衡數量，纔能有效。

sentences.english: Tariff quota concessions will be implemented according to the date specified in the "implementation" column.
sentences.chinese: 關稅配額減讓將按照“實施”欄中列明的日期實施。

sentences.english: They may also be put on half-rations.
sentences.chinese: 他們也會被削減一半配額的口糧。

sentences.english: The Norwegian mackerel quota will soon be over.
sentences.chinese: 挪威鯖魚的捕撈配額快用完了。

sentences.english: China says the quota cuts will prevent reckless and polluting mining of deposits.
sentences.chinese: 中國政府稱配額削減是爲了避免魯莽的開採積存污染。

sentences.english: The more you fear climate change, the more stringent the tax or quota should be.
sentences.chinese: 你越害怕氣候變化，稅收或配額的力度就應越強。

sentences.english: Conservationists claim that businessmen then flocked to the island and began rampantly abusing this quota.
sentences.chinese: 環保主義者說，商人云集巴厘島，開始濫用此項配額。

sentences.english: US accuse China for setting export duties and quotas on them.
sentences.chinese: 美國控訴中國對原材料設置出口稅及出口配額。

sentences.english: You can't have one building that consumes more than its share of the water supply.
sentences.chinese: 一棟大樓使用的自來水不能多於提供給它的配額。

definition: quota/number of places/place (in an institution, a group etc)
provision/to fix/to set/to formulate/to stipulate/to provide/regulation/rule/CL:個|个[ge4]
to pay/to hand over (tax payment etc)
to hand in/to hand over/to seize
